output: Scramble the eggs. Sauté onions in a pan until golden. Mix eggs into onions, add salt and pepper. Cook until fluffy.
Boil the rice. Grill the chicken with spices. Serve chicken over the rice with a side of yogurt.
Place cheese between two slices of bread. Butter the outside. Grill on a pan until golden brown (Grilled Cheese).
Boil pasta. Sauté tomatoes with garlic and olive oil to make sauce. Mix pasta with sauce.
